Package ca.rmen.sunrisesunset

Java utility which provides methods to determine the sunrise, sunset, civil twilight, nautical twilight, and astronomical twilight times of a given location.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SunriseSunset
    Provides methods to determine the sunrise, sunset, civil twilight, nautical twilight, and astronomical twilight times of a given location, or if it is currently day or night at a given location.

Package ca.rmen.sunrisesunset Description

Java utility which provides methods to determine the sunrise, sunset, civil twilight, nautical twilight, and astronomical twilight times of a given location. Also provides methods:
  • to convert between Gregorian and Julian dates.
  • to know if it is currently day or night at a given location.
The formulas used by this class are from the Wikipedia articles on Julian Day and Sunrise equation.
